07-11-2024: - Fixed {{ItemIcon|Item=Majestic Leap|Size=20}} Majestic Leap buff sticking around after attaching to zipline (caused audio bugs as well)
- Added a brief period before you can press the hotkey again to prevent accidental uses of drop down
06-20-2024: - Damage cooldown window increased from 4s to 5s
- Fixed cooldown reduction affecting the damage cooldown

- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Singularity|Size=20}} Singularity falls 70% slower when {{ItemIcon|Item=Majestic Leap|Size=20}} Majestic Leap down is used (similar to the hero falling slower normally when casting the ability from an elevation)
06-13-2024: - Drop down speed reduced from 51 to 36
05-23-2024: - Duration of no damage taken requirement reduced from 5s to 4s
05-16-2024: - You can now use the active again while in the air to dive down faster
